gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.data

Class GenericDataMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.data.GenericDataMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BinaryDataSet
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HelicorderData, RSAMData

    public class GenericDataMatrix
extends Object
implements BinaryDataSet
    BinaryDataSet to store cern's DoubleMatrix2D and meta information about matrix column's names.
    Author:
    Dan Cervelli

        public double[] leastSquares(int c)

        Returns:
